title: Death of member
context: ยง435E-20 Death of member. In the event a participating member who is in full compliance with the trust agreement dies, the initial contribution made by the decedent shall be returned to the member&rsquo;s estate or designated beneficiary; the indemnity coverage shall continue for the benefit of the decedent&rsquo;s estate in respect of occurrences during the time the decedent was a participating member; and neither the person receiving the repayment of the initial contribution nor the decedent&rsquo;s estate shall be responsible for any assessments levied following the death of the member. [L 1977, c 182, pt of ยง1]
